thread.title: Donald Trump kicks Univision out of a campaign event... again - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Donald Trump kicks Univision out of a campaign event... again - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Donald Trump kicks Univision out of a campaign event... again - Showbiz
text: Donald Trump has continued his feud with Spanish network Univision at his Florida rally.On Friday (October 23), Trump had a Univision crew removed from the event in Doral, Florida and Univision anchor Jorge Ramos wasn't about to keep it quiet.Freedom of the press? Univision's journalists were not allowed to cover a Donald Trump event today in Doral, Florida.— JORGE RAMOS (@jorgeramosnews) October 23, 2015Reporters from Fusion - jointly owned by Univision and Disney/ABC - were also denied entry to the campaign rally, reportedly due to it being a conflict of interest as Trump is suing Univision for $500 million.The Republican presidential candidate filed the lawsuit in June, after the Spanish network dropped Trump's Miss USA and Miss Universe pageants because of the mogul's derogatory comments about Mexican immigrants. © Getty Images / Bill Pugliano Back in August, Trump blocked Ramos from asking him about his immigration policies at a press event in Iowa.During a fiery debate over immigration, Trump could be heard telling Ramos to "Go back to Univision" before the reporter was temporarily ejected by a security guard.Trump later defended his ejecting of Ramos, stating that the reporter was "totally out of line".Earlier this week, Trump cancelled a scheduled appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live citing a prior commitment.
